attributes.action: Stop coming up with short term vote grabbing electioneering policies and only take action which is in the long term interest of the UK economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put the needs of the country before the selfish quest for re-election at any cost

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions that relate to the election as this is a civil servant-run website. You may want to rephrase your petition before resubmitting.
